text: Sonny Black is the 12th studio album by the German rapper Bushido. It was released on February 14, 2014 and it reached No. 1 on the German, Austrian and Swiss music charts. == Track listing == # Fotzen – 3:16 # Jeder meiner Freunde – 3:09 # Haifisch – 3:31 # Mitten in der Nacht – 3:55 # Crackdealer Sound – 3:17 # Sporttasche – 3:25 # Osama Flow – 3:02 # Gangsta Rap Kings (featuring Kollegah & Farid Bang) – 4:03 # Messerstecherei – 2:50 # Blei-Patronen – 3:40 # John Wayne – 2:44 # Tausend Gründe – 3:06 # Baseballschläger – 2:53 # AMG (featuring Shindy) – 2:49 # Nie ein Rapper II – 3:29 == References == Category:2014 albums
title: Sonny Black (album)
